title: Cindy Hval
subtitle: The aging membership at Fowler United Methodist Church has been rejuvenated by an influx of African #refugees. On Sunday evenings Pastor Marie Mwange preaches a sermon in Swahili. Her daughter Marcelline, 17, is her interpreter. Story coming soon. #lovemyjob @SpokesmanReviewpic.twitter.com/BdcAWJaNjn

title: David Manne
subtitle: Appearing today at Senate Inquiry to give evidence on a Bill to repeal medevac laws - laws which have ensured urgent medical needs of #asylum seekers and #refugees for evacuation are properly identified and met based on independent medical expertise. @RefugeeLegalpic.twitter.com/GTBg5pE9cX

title: ACAPS
subtitle:
#Sudan #floods
+179,000 people have been affected by heavy rains and flooding across 15 states.
Particularly vulnerable are the South Sudanese #refugees and Sudanese IDP’s.
Most urgent needs are shelter, WASH, health and food assistance.
https://www.acaps.org/country/sudan/special-reports#container-1323 …pic.twitter.com/UQnG4VODIi
